questions.question: You are managing a machine learning project and want to reuse a data preprocessing step from a previous pipeline for a new model. What feature of SageMaker Pipelines allows you to achieve this?
options: Steps in a pipeline can be reused across different projects, saving time and effort.
Pipelines must be redefined for each new model.
Pipeline steps are not reusable and must be manually duplicated for each new model.
Only parameter values can be reused in different pipelines.
correct_answers: Steps in a pipeline can be reused across different projects, saving time and effort.
questions.topic: Deployment and Orchestration of ML Workflows
